markdownRemark.html: We matched while I was swiping in the midst of work. When I sent that message, I didn't expect much. What attracted me was that you were passionate in programming, and I felt that we could connect well in that aspect. In the ensuing month + weeks, connect well did we. While we may not have known each other for long, the ensuing journey was something neither of us expected. Over here, some of our notable dates are listed and they contain my memories when the event happened. I hope that we do continue filling this site up day by day together, until we have a scrapbook of memories.

frontmatter.title: "Do you bake? Because I think I am in loaf with you"
